name: paul-shryock
description: Lead Front End Developer & Web Designer with 10 years experience building websites, apps, and digital products for enterprise clients, agencies & startups.

scripts.development: npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=development npx eleventy --serve
scripts.staging: npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=staging npx eleventy
scripts.production_old: npm run-script clean; ELEVENTY_ENV=production npx eleventy
scripts.production: if [ -e _site ]; then rm -R _site; fi; npx eleventy
